Author: Aida Enna, Edited by Rico Stryker and Nyanko, Rebranded by Maxunit, Rebranded by Nyanko
Name: NMB Doorbell
Description:
Play a chime when someone comes into a house, when they leave or when entering a house people are already inside.

Icon by Flaticon
Punchline: Play a chime when someone comes into a house.
